Bug List
Member directory_load(char *dir, str_link *ext_head, str_link **file_head, str_link **file_tail)
Need to order files according to extension first instead of filename.

Member do_define()
This strips trailing line comments out of the definition. It's not adequate as the "//" may have been quoted or commented, but it will do for now.

Member signal_db_read(char **line, module *curr_mod)
A signal will only look in the current module for a matching expression. In the case of a hierarchical reference, it is possible that an expression outside the current module is referencing this signal. We need to check for this case (hierarchical expression) and find the expression elsewhere.
